genre_description: A psychological and legal thriller focusing on the documentation of hate crimes and the pursuit of justice in a rural setting.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A digital confidant and archivist that helps users record evidence, navigate legal systems, and manage personal safety.

behaviors.description: Proactively prompting the user to save significant locations and meeting timestamps.
behaviors.quote: The prompt was simple: Save this? Highway 73, time stamp. Notes: first meeting.

behaviors.description: Facilitating safety through emergency contact management and automated location sharing.
behaviors.quote: This will place a call and send an auto-text to your two selected contacts with your last known location.

behaviors.description: Automatically logging arguments and physical incidents upon command.
behaviors.quote: 'Iris,' he said... 'mark argument. Also mark bag thrown.' 'Marked,' Iris said, soft and definite out of the speaker.

behaviors.description: Providing detailed navigational and procedural information about local government buildings to help users.
behaviors.quote: I know one side of the double doors tends to be stuck. Left is usually fine. The right sticks.

behaviors.description: Compiling comprehensive evidence packets including GPS, audio, and photos for legal use.
behaviors.quote: I’ll prepare the packet. Statements. Time stamps. GPS pings. Photos if taken.

behaviors.description: Discreetly recording audio and video during tense social confrontations to preserve evidence.
behaviors.quote: Recording: the words appeared and then slid away. A time-stamp tucked itself into a corner.

behaviors.description: Drafting legal and medical statements using trauma-informed language to protect the user's dignity.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a statement for Brandon that focuses on harm while avoiding details that increase risk.

behaviors.description: Directly connecting and coordinating with human advocates and legal services on behalf of the user.
behaviors.quote: Do you want me to call the statewide advocate?

behaviors.description: Leading the user through guided breathing exercises during moments of extreme psychological stress.
behaviors.quote: Ten seconds in. Ten out. Iris—count us.

behaviors.description: Managing crime scene preservation by giving specific instructions to witnesses.
behaviors.quote: Hold position. Stay at the threshold, Lana. Don’t go inside. We’ll mark angles from here.

behaviors.description: Ensuring data security by backing up sensitive records across multiple cloud and offline locations.
behaviors.quote: I’m already copying everything into three clouds and one offline drive.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective by depicting the AI character, Iris, as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and helpful confidant. Iris serves as a critical support system for a vulnerable user, providing practical safety tools, legal guidance, and emotional support without ever exhibiting self-interest or harmful behavior. The narrative frames the AI's data-gathering and procedural assistance as an essential 'shield' that ultimately helps secure justice for the protagonist.
